precondition: A context menu is open on the desktop.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the 'Display Properties' window will open. The 'Screen Saver' tab will be active by default.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the 'Power...' button in the 'Monitor Power Management' section.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box will open.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box will appear.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open with the 'Power Options Properties' tab selected. The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu is visible.
action: Open the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu and select 'Never'.
expected_results: The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu will show 'Never' as the selected option.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Power Options Properties' tab is selected.
action: Click the 'After 5 hours' item in the 'System hibernates' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'After 5 hours' option will be selected in the 'System hibernates' dropdown menu.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box will close.
